name: The Parchment - For The Realm
description:
Raise your house above all others and grasp for the crown. Use diplomacy, intrigue, trade and military power to increase your influence over the kingdom. Become king, be subjugated into vassalship or wiped from history completely.

  • PARCHMENT: Feel like a general pondering over an ancient parchment map and control your empire and armies. Watch new details being added to the map as you explore the country.
  • TIME: Work with a much more restrictive timeframe than you are used from other games of this genre. Every men you lose in battle will be dearly missed!
  • HOUSE: Create your own dynasty, with your own banner, lore and unique characters and traits, which will change your approach to the game.
  • DIPLOMACY: Gaining the crown without support will be a difficult task. Find allies and vassals to improve your chances.

Note: Languages other than English, German and Japanese will be machine translated for now. We constantly try to improve the translation for all languages. If your language is not supported yet (or faulty), you can make changes to the localization files in the Localization folder.
